T14stuplaku:10: darśitaṃ lokanāthena stokaṃ stokaṃ kvacit kvacit /
T14stuplaku:12: sarvan tan setum iveha bhadravyūhena kathyate // 2 //
T14stuplaku:14: na khabaddhaunnate snigdhe sthāne śucini kārayet // 3 //
T14stuplaku:19: tad aṃśena tu nemy ādi yāvad yaṣṭiśiraṃ kramāt // 5 //
T14stuplaku:20: caturasrā bhaven nemir adhastātaḥ tad ardhena /
T14stuplaku:23: udakodgamane yāvad ā śuddher cco bhuvaḥ smṛtāḥ // 7 //
T14stuplaku:26: tad ūrdhvaṃ vedikāḥ kāryāḥ catustridv'eka saṃkhyayā /
T14stuplaku:28: sārccā gṛh'; ekasaṃyuktāṃ ūrdhvāṃ vediṃ prakalpayet /
T14stuplaku:31: tisras teṣāṃ tu kartavyā caturthaṃ biṃba ba // 11 //
T14stuplaku:34: b is missing. From the commentary,
T14stuplaku:35: I am quoting the fragmentary pieces of the stanzas which were included in the text portion of folio 2a,b.
T14stuplaku:39: adho vedyā vistāras tad vedikāyā hrasve kṛtam / ... [15] (§18.6b.7).
T14stuplaku:53: arhanta cakravartis tu pratyekaś ca jino jinaḥ // 26 //
T14stuplaku:54: śaikṣāṇāṃ arhataś caiva gaṇakhaḍga jinasya ca /
T14stuplaku:59: adharā bhūmi pādāya yāvad ūrdhvaṃ krameṇa tu // 29 //
T14stuplaku:79: 17. kṣīṇāsravabalāni trīṇi cāvenikāni smṛtyupasthānāni trayodaśa cchatravalyāḥ
T14stuplaku:87: 23. alobhātmikacetovimukti dhvajaṃ ity api sa bhagavān ity ādi
T14stuplaku:97: tam ahaṃ śirasā vande bhadravyūhāhvayaṃ yatiṃ // 2 //
T14stuplaku:104: yasya vāco mano dehākhatulyāḥ sarvathā muneḥ //
T14stuplaku:105: taṃ pranasyata sātatvaṃ vakṣye vinayakārikām iti //
T14stuplaku:106: tad ekadeśa bhūtaṃ caidam ity anena nātrābhihitaṃ /
T14stuplaku:107: ata eva prakīrṇavinaya ity ādinā tayavatām asya sūcayati śāstrakāra ity ato na doṣaḥ /
T14stuplaku:108: Slkv §6 prakīrṇake hi yad viṃśatisahasrāyuṣiprajāyāṃ bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya kṛkina
T14stuplaku:109: rājñā stūpaḥ kṛtaḥ yojanam uccatvena yojanaṃ pariṇāhena ardhayojana pratisareṇa krośamātrikayā vedikayā /
T14stuplaku:111: sthale pradeśe stūpaṃ kartavyaṃ kārayatā prācīran ty evaṃ kartavyaṃ.
T14stuplaku:114: ā yakā aṇḍakaṃ kaṇṭhakaṃ kaṇṭhikā harmikā cchatrāvalī cchatraṃ ghaṇṭā dhvajaḥ patākā stūpagṛha āgama puṣkiriṇī prākāra coktaṃ /
T14stuplaku:116: cakravartibhūtena mayā yojanam uccaṃ yojanābhiveṣañ ca stūpaṃ kṛtam Slkv p. 215 iti /
T14stuplaku:117: tad anyeṣāṃ nikāyānām iti sarvāstivādināṃ stūpakalpanāsūtre kṣudrake coktaṃ /
T14stuplaku:118: Slkv §8 sagṛhastūpaḥ stambhaś catasraḥ pariṣaṇṇāḥ stambha sopāna lokapālā sthā sacandrasitāmbaraḥ patākā makaradhvajādayaḥ coktāḥ /
T14stuplaku:120: sarṣapaphalamātra dhātor arthāya āmalakamātraṃ stūpaṃ kārayet /
T14stuplaku:127: na khādi varjitonnate madhyonnate snigdhe arūkṣe śucini amedhyarahite //
T14stuplaku:128: ity evaṃ stūpodgamapradeśaviśeṣaṃ nirdhāya lakṣaṇaṃ samupadarśayann āha /
T14stuplaku:135: Slkv §11 evam ihāpi pariṇāhaśabdena maṇḍalanābheś caturdiśaṃ /
T14stuplaku:137: caturthī pi kalaśādisthasaṃsthāneṣu tan mātraṃ pṛthutvasyāvyabhicārāt /
T14stuplaku:138: kiṃ saṃbandhinā pariṇāhena kumbhasya kumbhuḥ karaṇḍaka tasya pariṇāhena stūpa dairgheṇeṣṭam ity arthaḥ /
T14stuplaku:139: uktaṃ hi prakīrṇavinaye yojanam uccatvena yojanaṃ pariṇāheneti /
T14stuplaku:141: caturasrā catuṣkoṇabhūmyāṃ kumbhaḥ karaṇḍaḥ maṇḍalānurūpyena nemivistāro bhavatīty arthaḥ /
T14stuplaku:143: eṣa kaścit stūpaṃ kārayatā prācīrāntāt tāvat kārayitavyeti tad anukramārthaṃ cātra caturasrake maṇḍalasūtrapātād bāhyābāhyato madhyakoṣṭhaparikṣepo 'bhyantarataś ca /
T14stuplaku:145: Slkv p. 216 tato 'bhyantare ca nemibhittivistārārdhena draṣṭavyam iti /
T14stuplaku:147: udakodbhedaṃ vā yāvad āśuddher vā bhuvaḥ pṛthivyāḥ smṛtam ity arthaḥ /
T14stuplaku:148: aṣṭabhāgonnatam ity ādi nemimānād aṣṭamāṃsam ādāya tenājitam unnataṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ /
T14stuplaku:151: vistāratas tv ayā vedikād bahiḥ kumbhapariṇāhapādenaiṣṭaṃ /
T14stuplaku:152: catur asrikā medhī vedī jaṃghāpuṭāvedī kartavyeti /
T14stuplaku:154: catasra pariṣaṇṇāḥ kartavyā iti catus tri dv';
T14stuplaku:161: tad āha ca catuṣkonāṣṭakoṇā vā athavā parimaṇḍaleti /
T14stuplaku:170: puṣpagrahaṇīśabdena na ca vedikābāhyata samantato vāpya paṃktyākāreṇa nānāsaṃsthānagṛhadvāramātre pūrvajātakapratimāṇāṃ racaneti //
T14stuplaku:172: harmikām upādāya yo 'dhaś caturthako Slkv p. 217 bāhyakoṣṭhāṃśas tatra dhānyarāśikṛtaḥ /
T14stuplaku:180: madhyakoṣṭhapramāṇena tisro vedyaḥ kāryāḥ pariśiṣṭānāṃ tu yathā pratyanusāreneti /
T14stuplaku:183: adhaś caturthake bhāge kṛtānāṃ tisrāṇāṃ vedīnāṃ yāvantām apramāṇaṃ /
T14stuplaku:184: caturthī jaṃghāvedī catuṣkoṣṭhāpi kumbhasaṃsthāneṣv ity arthaḥ /
T14stuplaku:188: jaṃghāsaṃbandhinī vā puṭāvedī kumbhasya padmavalitam ity arthaḥ /
T14stuplaku:190: ṣaṇṇāṃ bāhyakoṣṭhānāṃ yo vistāras tad āyāmānāṃ tad dairghyām adhovedī kuryāt /
T14stuplaku:191: atha bāhyakoṣṭhena vedikā ukteti ṣaṭsaṃkhyaparicchinna-āyāmo yasyā vedyaḥ sābāhyakoṣṭha ṣaḍāyāmamātrām adhovedīṃ kalpayet /
T14stuplaku:192: yataḥ prakīrṇake yojanam uccasya krośamātrāvedīm ukteti /
T14stuplaku:196: athavā catasraḥ pariṣaṇṇāḥ kartavyā iti vacanāt //
T14stuplaku:198: ardhardhonnati Slkv p. 218 kṣīṇañ ca kalpayet /
T14stuplaku:199: evaṃ tāvad bhūṅ gata stūpam ākhyāyādhunā bhūmimarjane stūpaṃ kṛtaṃ /
T14stuplaku:202: ato bhūmyā nimarjanena kāraṇāyāyan darśayann āha /
T14stuplaku:204: idan tu nimarjane nimarjanārthaṃ bhūmau stūpasya bhavatu unmānato kṣayo vedikānāṃ vistāras tu kim arthaṃ /
T14stuplaku:206: yata stūpāyāmatulyo hy adho vedyā vistāra iṣyate /
T14stuplaku:207: Slkv §18 yathā hy uktaṃ mahāvastuni cakravartibhūtena mayā stūpo kṛto yojanoccatvena yojanam abhiniveśeneti /
T14stuplaku:208: yatra hi yathā dhānyarāśyākṛteḥ kumbhasya yojanāni niveśya yojanābhiniveśo gamyate /
T14stuplaku:209: tathā vedikāyā api tu kumbhapariṇāha pramāṇena stūpa uccābhipretaḥ /
T14stuplaku:210: adhovedyā vistāras tad vedikāyā hrasve kṛtaṃ /
T14stuplaku:214: Slkv §19 unnāmena tathā kuryād ity ādi /
T14stuplaku:216: harmikām upādāya yo 'dhaś caturthabāhyakoṣṭhāṃśas tasya yo vibhāgaḥ prākkṛtas tenaiva vibhāgenaikona tisro vedyaḥ jaṃghāvedikādyā ity āvyāhāryaṃ
T14stuplaku:217: na nirgacchet yathā biṃbam ity ādi /
T14stuplaku:220: karaṇḍaṃ yathā nādhaḥ pratiset tathordhvāṃ vedīm unnatāṃ kuryāt /
T14stuplaku:223: prādhyānyena ūrdhvavartinyāś caturthyā jaṃghāvedyā hrāsonnāmakaraṇenaiva kumbhasyodgamam adhomarjanañ ca saṃpadyate /
T14stuplaku:225: Slkv §21 vedītrayasya connāmahrāso yataḥ tasmān nām';
T14stuplaku:226: adhoṃgaṇe ca kumbhe hrasvāt tato kuryād ity arthaḥ /
T14stuplaku:231: karaṇḍaś ca tatas tūrikām iti jaṃghāpuṭāvedyā upari dhānyarāśy ādi saṃsthāne na kumbhaṃ vartulaṃ kuryāt //
T14stuplaku:235: bāhyakoṣṭhadvayonmānavedyāsanād udgato vartulārdhapauṣṭiko dhānyarāśisaṃsthāno na tu tribhāgocchritaḥ /
T14stuplaku:247: abhiniveśamātraṃ apāsya yaḥ satvabhāvena īṣan samādhikabāhyakoṣṭhakordhvonmānāvedyāsanān samutthitaṃ /
T14stuplaku:249: Slkv §24 na kevalaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ pratimā kumbhena kāryā kāṃcaneti buddhapratimā api /
T14stuplaku:251: lakṣam iti pratimālaṃkārair hi stūpam alaṃkartum iti /
T14stuplaku:252: yatra hi pratimālaṃkārasyāpi pratiṣedhas tatra kathaṃ pratimāyā syāt /
T14stuplaku:254: Slkv §25 tad ūrdhvaṃ bāhyakoṣṭhasyety ādi bāhyakoṣṭhasya bhāgatyāgonnāmataś caturthārdhaparityāgaḥ parigrahaḥ śeṣapādatrayasya cch (?)
T14stuplaku:255: id unnāmas Slkv p. 220 tasya ṣaṭ kṛtvā ardhāṃśaṃ kumbhāntaḥ praviṣṭam āṃśadvayaṃ kaṇṭhakaṃ /
T14stuplaku:256: Slkv §26 ekam āṃśakaṃ kaṇṭhikāvalitakāṃ harmikā yathākramaṃ /
T14stuplaku:258: bāhyakoṣṭhavistārā harmikā tasyādhaḥ svonmānena samantataḥ kaṇṭhakaṃ //
T14stuplaku:260: yathā śobhānurūpato vā anyathā kalpayed iti /
T14stuplaku:263: pañcaviṃśatikoṣṭhavibhāgena yaṣṭer mūlamadhyaśirasā parigrahaṃ sugamo harmikāyā ūrdhvaṃ catuṣṭha pi kumbhasaṃsthāneṣu bāhyakoṣṭhadvayonmāno 'dhas va yāvat /
T14stuplaku:266: yathā yaṣṭer āyāmakṣayāṃ vā pariṇāhakṣayo vāpy avagantavyam ity evaṃ yāvat /
T14stuplaku:273: yataḥ proktaṃ yathā syā śobhano bhavet /
T14stuplaku:277: yan mayoparjitaṃ puṇyaṃ tenāstu stūpas tu sugato jana iti //
T14stuplaku:279: after this follows the Newārī note of a Nepalese librarian.
T14stuplaku:280: Slkv §29 śrī syaṃguyāyita siyā jetanaku 35 aṃgu liḍā 5 yavanhasa 7 saaṃkanaghāva //
T14stuplaku:281: ghātasaku 9 ku 5 ghalasaku 3 umaḍe thaṃthu ucaku 18 aṃ 5 yavanhana pramāneti madhyamādi kramena //
T14stuplaku:284: 1 x x x x x pralase tīsijya pu manasīyā tachosathu se kho thu teya u(?)
T14stuplaku:286: 2 ālayana // etad dharma x x x chela x x x x x //
